ord Rugger Shattershield was a senior member of the noble patriar Shattershield family of Baldurs Gate and a member of the Parliament of Peers in the late 15 century DR.
Rugger was a gold dwarf with luscious head of pampered brown hair, clean-shaven face, double chin, and hazel eyes.
In the , shortly before the armies of the Cult of the Absolute attacked the city of Baldurs Gate, Lord Rugger Shattershield was a Parliamentarian of the Gate who voted in support of crowning lowborn Lord Enver Gortash as the citys Archduke. Rugger Shattershield was present for Gortashs coronation that took place in the audience hall of Wyrms Rock. Following the coronation, he proudly supported the Archdukes steen constructs and the safety they brought in face of a looming war. In a conversation with Alia Durinbold, Rugger stated that the steel watchers and the Flaming Fists needed to be in the same chain of command under the same commander â€“ Lord Enver Gortash.
